def min_operation_1_to_sort(sequence):
    sorted_sequence = sorted(sequence)
    original_evens = sequence[::2]
    sorted_evens = sorted_sequence[::2]
    mismatches = len(set(original_evens) ^ set(sorted_evens))
    return mismatches / 2
